text: @Liberal_Voice🚨 Privatization Warning! 🚨Did you know that private-sector ER care is 21% more expensive than VHA care? 💸🤯 Yet, VCCP providers are pushing for privatization. 🤔VHA providers undergo extensive training to treat veteran-specific issues. 💪🏽🎓 We can't let privatization fans like Darin Selnick dismantle our only model of comprehensive health care! 🙅‍♂️💥#VHA
